IGNORE_ERROR:drop table BCK_LINE_TRT

create table BCK_LINE_TRT (
I_TRT NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
ORD_TRT NUMERIC(10) NOT NULL ,
SQL_NAME VARCHAR(400) NOT NULL ,
DEF_TECHNO VARCHAR(35) ,
DEF_I_TXT NUMERIC(10) ,
DEF_CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR(35) ,
DEF_LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) ,
DEF_CONNECT_ID VARCHAR(1) ,
DEF_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR(1) ,
DEF_ISOL_LEVEL VARCHAR(3) ,
DEF_PLAN_COMP VARCHAR(1) ,
COL_TECHNO VARCHAR(35) ,
COL_I_TXT NUMERIC(10) ,
COL_CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR(35) ,
COL_LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR(35) ,
COL_CONNECT_ID VARCHAR(1) ,
COL_ISOL_LEVEL VARCHAR(3) ,
COL_IND_COMMIT VARCHAR(1) ,
COL_PLAN_COMP VARCHAR(1) ,
IND_ERR VARCHAR(1) ,
LOG_LEV_DET VARCHAR(1) ,
IND_LOG_NB VARCHAR(1) ,
KCM_PK VARCHAR(1) ,
KCM_JOIN VARCHAR(1) ,
KCM_COND VARCHAR(1) ,
KCM_AK VARCHAR(1) ,
KCM_NULL VARCHAR(1) ,
KCM_ERR_DEL VARCHAR(1) ,
KLM_AFTER_INT VARCHAR(1) ,
ALWAYS_EXE VARCHAR(1) NOT NULL ,
KXM_USED VARCHAR(1) ,
FIRST_DATE TIMESTAMP ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR(400) ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR(400) ,
LAST_DATE TIMESTAMP ,
KJM_DROP VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_CREATE VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_SUBSCRIBE VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_UNSUBSCRIBE VARCHAR(1) ,
KLM_JRN VARCHAR(1) ,
KIM_JRN VARCHAR(1) ,
KIM_JRN_POP VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_SET_INSTALL VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_SET_UNINSTALL VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_EXTEND VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_LOCK VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_UNLOCK VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_PURGE VARCHAR(1) ,
KJM_TABLE_ORDER VARCHAR(1) ,
IND_LOG_METHOD VARCHAR(1) ,
KLM_IDX VARCHAR(1) ,
KIM_IDX VARCHAR(1) ,
KIM_DRVD_SEL VARCHAR(1) ,
IND_LOG_FINAL_CMD VARCHAR(1)
)

insert into BCK_LINE_TRT (
I_TRT ,
ORD_TRT ,
SQL_NAME ,
DEF_TECHNO ,
DEF_I_TXT ,
DEF_CONTEXT_CODE ,
DEF_LSCHEMA_NAME ,

KCM_PK ,

KLM_AFTER_INT ,
ALWAYS_EXE ,
KXM_USED ,

LAST_USER ,

KJM_UNSUBSCRIBE ,
KLM_JRN ,
KIM_JRN ,
KIM_JRN_POP ,
KJM_SET_INSTALL ,
KJM_SET_UNINSTALL ,
KJM_EXTEND ,
KJM_LOCK ,
KJM_UNLOCK ,
KJM_PURGE ,
KJM_TABLE_ORDER ,
IND_LOG_METHOD ,
KLM_IDX ,
KIM_IDX ,
KIM_DRVD_SEL
) select
I_TRT ,
ORD_TRT ,
SQL_NAME ,
DEF_TECHNO ,
DEF_I_TXT ,
DEF_CONTEXT_CODE ,
DEF_LSCHEMA_NAME ,
DEF_CONNECT_ID ,
DEF_IND_COMMIT ,
DEF_ISOL_LEVEL ,
DEF_PLAN_COMP ,
COL_TECHNO ,
COL_I_TXT ,
COL_CONTEXT_CODE ,
COL_LSCHEMA_NAME ,
COL_CONNECT_ID ,
COL_ISOL_LEVEL ,
COL_IND_COMMIT ,
COL_PLAN_COMP ,
IND_ERR ,
LOG_LEV_DET ,
IND_LOG_NB ,
KCM_PK ,
KCM_JOIN ,
KCM_COND ,
KCM_AK ,
KCM_NULL ,
KCM_ERR_DEL ,
KLM_AFTER_INT ,
ALWAYS_EXE ,
KXM_USED ,
FIRST_DATE ,
FIRST_USER ,
LAST_USER ,
LAST_DATE ,
KJM_DROP ,
KJM_CREATE ,
KJM_SUBSCRIBE ,
KJM_UNSUBSCRIBE ,
KLM_JRN ,
KIM_JRN ,
KIM_JRN_POP ,
KJM_SET_INSTALL ,
KJM_SET_UNINSTALL ,
KJM_EXTEND ,
KJM_LOCK ,
KJM_UNLOCK ,
KJM_PURGE ,
KJM_TABLE_ORDER ,
IND_LOG_METHOD ,
KLM_IDX ,
KIM_IDX ,
KIM_DRVD_SEL
from SNP_LINE_TRT
drop table SNP_LINE_TRT
rename table BCK_LINE_TRT to SNP_LINE_TRT
alter table SNP_COL add constraint PK_COL primary key ( I_COL )
